# flex 和 Grid 居中

/* flex */
display: flex;
justify-content: center;
align-items: center;
/* grid */
display: grid;
place-items: center;

# css 实现滚动贴合

核心属性

scroll-snap-type scroll-snap-align

查看详情 scroll-snap-type (opens new window)

查看详情 scroll-snap-align (opens new window)

.container {
  scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;
  height: 100vh;
  overflow: scroll;
}

.Child {
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
  scroll-snap-align: start;
}
